IONIAN SEA.
GREECE.
DNC 09.
M/V QUATERDECIES, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD,
SINKING AND ABANDONING SHIP
IN 36-56.80N 019-48.90E AT 070035Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC PIRAEUS,
INMARSAT-C: 423 767 310,
